physical_appearance: "The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a three men and a dog. All three men are wearing shirts with the sleeves folded above the elbows, pants, and black shoes. They are sitting down beside one another and a dog is with them. They are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. There is a large vehicle directly behind them. ""1602989"" is displayed on the side body of the vehicle. Further in the background
title_text: Military Personnel and a Dog Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: a tower can be seen at the top of the photograph" military personnel Canis (genus)
